textAfterTable: According to our current on-line database, K. Jon Barwise has 10 students and 12 descendants. We welcome any additional information. If you have additional information or corrections regarding this mathematician, please use the update form. To submit students of this mathematician, please use the new data form, noting this mathematician's MGP ID of 9274 for the advisor ID.
